http://www.hifi-remote.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=11769&postdays=0&postorder=asc&&start=60
IrScrutinizer does all this for you. I just copied your post to the clipboard, imported it in IrScrutinizer (Import -> text -> Raw, line-based, Load from clipboard, Import all/raw), then to export, select text and sendir; press "Export raw remote", and "Open last file". Outcome:
